hero-section.title: Visualize your Steam profile in <1>a single image</1>
hero-section.description: Generate your Steam profile card with MySteam. You can easily embed it on GitHub or your website.

features-section.title: Beautifully Display Your Steam Data
features-section.description: MySteam provides various features to visually represent your Steam game library and play history.

profile-card-gen.title: Profile Card Image Generation
profile-card-gen.description: Generate your recently played games and library as a single image
profile-card-gen.content: Fetch the latest data from your Steam profile and provide it as a customizable single image.

dynamic-svg.title: Dynamic SVG Endpoint
dynamic-svg.description: Visualize data in lightweight, high-quality SVG format
dynamic-svg.content: Provides dynamic SVGs that can be easily embedded in GitHub profiles and websites.

open-source.title: Open Source
open-source.description: Completely open source and freely customizable
open-source.content: The code is published on GitHub and can be freely modified and extended.

examples-section.title: Various Display Styles
examples-section.description: Explore the various display styles offered by MySteam.

small.title: Small
small.description: A small-sized profile card. Displays your 5 recently played games and top 5 owned games.

medium.title: Medium
medium.description: A medium-sized profile card. Displays your 10 recently played games and top 10 owned games.

large.title: Large
large.description: A large-sized profile card. Displays your 50 recently played games and top 50 owned games.
